title: Rich Land, Wasteland
description: The current effect of mining in Australia : the author interviews people from around Australia on how rural and semi-rural people are being affected. It is not anti-mining per se, but it does describe how Australians arent the first on the agenda in many instances; and neither is the future of the land. Check the website : http://richlandwasteland.com/ the publishers' website : http://www.panmacmillan.com.au/displa... and the author's blog http://sharynmunro.com/
author: Sharyn Munro
